Description: Ostracon, large section of the body of an orange-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393553) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393553)
